org.darkphoenixs.kafka.core

接口 KafkaMessageSender<K,V>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    KafkaMessageSenderImpl

    public interface KafkaMessageSender<K,V>

    Title: KafkaMessageSender

    Description: Kafka消息发送接口

    从以下版本开始:
    2015-06-01
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Victor.Zxy

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Title: close Description: The sender is not really closed but sent back into pool.
      void send(String topic, V value)
      Title: send Description: Send the msg to Kafka
      void sendWithKey(String topic, K key, V value)
      Title: sendWithKey Description: Send the msg to Kafka
      void shutDown()
      Title: shutDown Description: Shutdown this sender, so it could not be used again.

    • 字段详细资料

      • logger

        static final org.slf4j.Logger logger
        logger

    • 方法详细资料

      • send

        void send(String topic,
        V value)

        Title: send

        Description: Send the msg to Kafka

        参数:
        topic - topic name
        value - data to be sent

      • sendWithKey

        void sendWithKey(String topic,
               K key,
               V value)

        Title: sendWithKey

        Description: Send the msg to Kafka

        参数:
        topic - topic name
        key - the key of data
        value - data to be sent

      • close

        void close()

        Title: close

        Description: The sender is not really closed but sent back into pool.

      • shutDown

        void shutDown()

        Title: shutDown

        Description: Shutdown this sender, so it could not be used again.
